subdisciplines.name: Communication Theory
subdisciplines.description: The study of theories that explain how communication functions in various settings and contexts.

subdisciplines.name: Organizational Culture
subdisciplines.description: The study of the shared values, beliefs, and practices that make up an organization's culture.

subdisciplines.name: Organizational Design
subdisciplines.description: The study of the structures and processes that organizations use to accomplish their goals.

subdisciplines.name: Leadership
subdisciplines.description: The study of the processes by which individuals influence others to achieve organizational goals and objectives.

subdisciplines.name: Group Dynamics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the processes that influence the behavior and performance of groups and teams within organizations.
